application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 16 ( Fence or Barrier), Conditions 29 (External Lighting Strategy), 32 (Biodiversity), 34 (Landscape and Ecological Management Plan) of planning permission 22/00908/KPSID (Proposed erection of new two storey SEND School (Special Educational Needs and Disabilities) with associated car park and hard court play area)
decision_conditions: The applicant has failed to provide the necessary updates and clarification in respect of conditions 32 & 34.  No satisfactory response  has been received and the conditions cannot be discharged  until such a time as the issues are fully resolved. The proposal has therefore failed to  demonstrate suitable  long term management of the newly created habitat features and does not demonstrate that the biodiversity and nature conservation value of the site will be safeguarded, and is therefore contrary to policy G6 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS3 and DM6 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
